page.title: 18Westcliff Estate.(Continued)
page.content: The flats on this part of the estate were only two storeys high and looked more like the large houses across the road. They were in blocks of four and were not really like flats at all because they were quite large.Not far away from this small number of flats, there were some three blocked houses. These were three storeys high with a garage at ground level, and the living quarters above. Some of the garages needed repainting and windows replacing, and there was also evidence of quite a lot of vandalism. At the other end of the same road, however, the dormer houses were very well kept. The unusual thing about these types of houses is that the upstairs windows stick out from the sloping roof, over the lower ones, and they were large.
